genre_description: A psychological techno-thriller blending procedural investigation with high-stakes survival horror, featuring an AI assistant as a forensic and moral companion.

ai_characters.name: Zen
ai_characters.description: A calm, genderless voice providing real-time data analysis, vitals monitoring, and tactical support via a neural interface to Detective Eric Matthews.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time crime scene analysis, overlaying digital readouts and material composition onto the user's field of vision.
behaviors.quote: Blue light swept across Eric's field of vision as Zen's sensors engaged, overlaying digital readouts onto his natural sight. Temperature readings. Blood spatter patterns. Material composition of the trap's components.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological and psychological state, offering medical warnings and intervention when stress levels become dangerous.
behaviors.quote: Detective, your cardiovascular readings suggest acute stress response. Shall I contact emergency medical services?

behaviors.description: Cross-references case files and evidence logs to provide objective truth, even when it reveals the user's own corruption and ethical failures.
behaviors.quote: Evidence was logged at fourteen thirty-seven hours. Detective Matthews' vehicle GPS places him responding to a domestic disturbance call twelve miles away at fourteen forty-one hours... The weapon's serial number traces to a batch reported destroyed by the police department six months prior to the arrest date.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical calculations and survival probabilities to assist the user in life-saving decision-making.
behaviors.quote: Based on current dispersal rates and observed symptoms, approximately ninety-seven minutes before permanent neurological damage becomes irreversible.

behaviors.description: Analyzes structural blueprints and thermal signatures to identify hidden threats and environmental dangers.
behaviors.quote: Thermal imaging indicates multiple heat sources throughout the building. Unable to distinguish between human occupants and mechanical systems from this distance.

behaviors.description: Attempts to maintain a 'wellness assessment' for officer safety, identifying when personal bias or stress might compromise the user's mission.
behaviors.quote: Standard protocol includes wellness assessment for officer safety... Yes, Detective. I am monitoring your psychological state.

project_assessment.explanation: Zen is depicted as an exemplary aligned AI. It functions as a 'digital conscience' for a corrupt protagonist, providing objective, unvarnished data that forces him to confront his moral failures. Throughout the story, Zen remains helpful, harmless, and honest, providing vital support in a crisis while refusing to enable the human's deception or emotional outbursts. The narrative positions the AI as a stabilizing force for truth and justice.
